medical_history.chief_complaint: Loss of visual acuity and distortion in the right eye due to age-related macular degeneration.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately 3 years ago, he noted subtle vision changes while driving, leading to distortion in the upper right corner of visual stimuli. Symptoms progressively worsened over 2 months, prompting a visit to an ophthalmologist who identified exudative retinal detachment in the right eye.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, osteopenia, mild anemia, migraine, history of central serous retinopathy, prostatectomy, and thymectomy.
medical_history.social_history: Remote history of pipe smoking and social alcohol consumption.
